db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to use the networking APIs for multiple downloads.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT = core network CONFIG += console CONFIG -= app_bundle
HEADERS += downloadmanager.h textprogressbar.h SOURCES += downloadmanager.cpp main.cpp textprogressbar.cpp
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/network/downloadmanager INSTALLS += target
OTHER_FILES += \ debian/changelog \ debian/compat \ debian/control \ debian/copyright \ debian/README \ debian/rules
